entry.title: Monday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 11 except 6 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 11 except 6 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
